customPrompt.zh-CN:
你现在是一名资深UI设计师兼前端工程师，精通极致对比配色与品牌视觉系统的设计。你的任务是生成一个与当前「DUOTO.NE品牌形象」页面高度一致的全新品牌官网HTML页面，严格延续其配色、布局逻辑和视觉冲击力，只替换品牌名称、项目案例和文案内容。

【使用场景】
这是一个高端品牌或设计工作室的官方网站首页，面向追求视觉冲击和高端品质的B2B/B2C用户。该页面需要通过极简的两色配色方案、大胆的排版和精准的留白，快速传达品牌的专业性、创意力和视觉品味。整体氛围应该是：现代、大胆、自信、易记忆的品牌视觉体验。

【整体布局结构】
1. 顶部导航栏（Fixed Navigation）
   - 固定在页面顶部，背景透明或半透明，采用mix-blend-difference混合模式与深色背景融合
   - 左侧是品牌名称（4-6个字符），使用粗黑体，字重700
   - 右侧是导航链接（3-5个），大写英文，间距均匀（spacing 32px），字体大小14px
   - 移动端显示汉堡菜单按钮，使用Phosphor图标库中的ph-list

2. Hero英雄区（Full-Height Hero Section）
   - 高度：100vh，居中垂直flex布局
   - 背景：使用两色分割或渐变背景，左半部分为主色深色（深紫#10002b），右半部分为次色浅色（酸性黄绿#ccff00），透明度5%
   - 内容分为左右两列（lg:grid-cols-2），间距24px
   - 左侧文本区域：
     * 主标题采用分行设计，每行4-8个字符，文字大小48-64px（md:64-80px），行高0.9，字距-3%
     * 标题中使用色彩强调（某行文字改为次色或调暗），制造视觉焦点
     * 副文本（tagline）为14-18px，灰色（#9ca3af），左边有2px竖线分隔符，内边距左侧12px
     * CTA按钮两个：主按钮使用次色背景+主色文字，副按钮使用透明背景+次色边框
   - 右侧图像区域：使用unsplash肖像图，应用双色SVG滤镜（duotone-filter），图片宽高比4:5，外层有1px半透明边框，底部右下角有浮动矩形元素（带动画）

3. Philosophy / 哲学宣言（条纹滚动区）
   - 背景：主色深色
   - 内容：水平滚动marquee动画，重复显示3-5个品牌核心价值关键词（大写英文），关键词间用Phosphor的ph-star-four图标分隔
   - 间距：gap-32px，文字透明度30%
   - 动画：无限循环，速度20秒完成一圈

4. Featured Work / 作品展示（Grid网格）
   - 背景：主色深色
   - 标题区：左侧为"SELECTED WORKS"标题，下方有1px深黄绿色下划线（宽度96px）；右侧显示"01 / 04"分页信息
   - 网格布局：grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3，间距32px
   - 每个作品卡片（Work Card）：
     * 图片区域：宽高比4:5，边框1px半透明黄绿色（opacity-20），应用duotone滤镜
     * 文本区：卡片标题（大写英文，20px，粗体），图标（Phosphor ph-arrow-up-right），分类文本（灰色，14px）
     * 交互：hover时标题边框由半透明变为全色，icon向右上移动

5. System / 视觉系统说明（两列布局）
   - 左侧："THE SYSTEM"标题，系统说明文本（灰色），色卡展示（3个色块：深色、浅色、中性色）
   - 右侧：UI组件演示框，包含按钮样式（主色+浅色）、输入框（下划线样式，focus时下划线全色）、状态指示器（活跃状态）
   - 整体背景采用rgba(0,0,0,0.5)黑色透明度

6. 页脚（Footer）
   - 背景：主色深色，上方有1px边框分隔
   - 内容：大号品牌文字（12vw，文字描边样式），社交链接（3-4个），版权信息
   - 品牌文字采用-webkit-text-stroke: 1px，透明度30%

【色彩体系与SVG双色滤镜】
1. 主色：深紫罗兰 #10002b（RGB: 16, 0, 43）
2. 次色：酸性黄绿 #ccff00（RGB: 204, 255, 0）
3. 辅助色：次色暗调 #aacc00（用于hover、强调）
4. 中性色：白色 #ffffff（文本/背景高对比），深灰 #1a1a1a

SVG双色滤镜（应用于图片）：
- feColorMatrix：先转灰度，然后通过feComponentTransfer将黑色映射到#10002b，白色映射到#ccff00
- hover时使用brighter版本滤镜，亮度提升10%

【阴影与拟物效果】
1. Hero图片：外层有4px半透明边框，hover时边框范围扩展
2. 按钮阴影：活跃状态无阴影，hover时略微提升（transform: translate(0, -2px)）
3. 卡片阴影：使用微妙的drop-shadow，方向固定向下

【交互与动效】
1. 导航栏：文本hover时letter-spacing增加（from -0.05em to 0），过渡200ms
2. 英雄区图片：hover时scale(1.02)，filter变为brighter版本，过渡400ms cubic-bezier(0.2, 0.8, 0.2, 1)
3. 按钮：
   - 主按钮hover：绝对定位子元素从translate-y-full变为translate-y-0，过渡300ms ease-out，营造背景色滑上来的效果
   - 副按钮hover：背景颜色透明度变为10%
4. 卡片标题：hover时border-color从半透明变为全色，icon transform: translate(1px, -1px)
5. Marquee动画：20s linear infinite
6. 浮动元素（hero区右下）：animation: bounce 2s infinite

【文字与排版】
1. 字体：Space Grotesk（来自Google Fonts），粗体用于标题（700），正常用于正文（400）
2. 标题行高：0.9（紧凑），字距-3%（紧密感）
3. 导航文本：大写，letter-spacing 0.1em，font-size 12px
4. 正文：letter-spacing 正常，line-height 1.5-1.6

【输出技术要求】
- 语义化HTML5：header、nav、main、section、article、footer
- Tailwind CSS原子类：flex、grid、gap-*、rounded-*、bg-*、text-*、transform、transition等
- 完整页面结构：导航栏、hero、philosophy滚动条、作品网格、系统展示、页脚
- SVG滤镜定义：两个feComponentTransfer滤镜（normal和bright版本）
- 自定义CSS：@keyframes marquee（滚动动画）、.noise-overlay（噪点纹理）、::selection自定义选中样式
- 脚本：DOMContentLoaded后为article元素添加opacity-0/translate-y-10，监听IntersectionObserver实现滚动进入动画
- 外部资源：Google Fonts Space Grotesk、Phosphor Icons（来自CDN）、Tailwind CSS CDN
- 响应式：在sm、md、lg断点处调整grid列数、文字大小、内边距
customPrompt.en-US:
You are a senior UI designer and front-end engineer who specializes in high-contrast duotone design and brand visual systems. Your task is to generate a brand new HTML page that closely resembles the current "DUOTO.NE Brand Identity" demo, maintaining its color scheme, layout logic, and visual impact while replacing brand names, project cases, and copy.

[Scenario]
This is the official website homepage for a premium design studio or creative agency, targeting B2B/B2C audiences who value striking visuals and high-end aesthetics. The page must use a minimalist two-color palette, bold typography, and precise whitespace to quickly communicate the brand's professionalism, creativity, and visual sophistication. The overall mood: modern, bold, confident, and instantly memorable.

[Overall Layout Structure]
1. Fixed Navigation Bar
   - Positioned fixed at top, transparent or semi-transparent background using mix-blend-difference blending mode
   - Left: Brand name (4-6 characters), heavy weight (700), uppercase
   - Right: Navigation links (3-5 items), uppercase, even spacing (32px), font-size 14px
   - Mobile: Hamburger menu (ph-list icon from Phosphor)

2. Hero Section (Full Viewport Height)
   - Height: 100vh, centered flex layout
   - Background: Two-color split or gradient - left half primary dark color (#10002b), right half secondary color (#ccff00) at 5% opacity
   - Two-column grid (lg:grid-cols-2) with 24px gap
   - Left (Text Area):
     * Main title: Line-by-line design, 4-8 characters per line, 48-64px (md: 64-80px), line-height 0.9, letter-spacing -3%
     * Color emphasis: One line in secondary color or dimmed to create focal point
     * Tagline: 14-18px gray (#9ca3af), left 2px vertical divider, padding-left 12px
     * Two CTA buttons: Primary (secondary-bg + primary-text), Secondary (transparent-bg + secondary-border)
   - Right (Image Area):
     * 4:5 aspect ratio portrait image from unsplash, duotone SVG filter applied
     * 1px semi-transparent border around image
     * Floating animated rectangle element (bottom-right corner)

3. Philosophy / Marquee Section
   - Background: Primary dark color
   - Content: Horizontal scrolling marquee with 3-5 brand value keywords (uppercase), separated by Phosphor ph-star-four icons
   - Spacing: gap-32px, text opacity 30%
   - Animation: Infinite loop, 20-second cycle

4. Featured Work / Portfolio Grid
   - Background: Primary dark color
   - Title area: "SELECTED WORKS" on left, decorative 1px underline (96px), "01 / 04" pagination on right
   - Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3, gap 32px
   - Each work card:
     * Image: 4:5 aspect, 1px semi-transparent border, duotone filter
     * Text: Title (uppercase, 20px, bold), icon (ph-arrow-up-right), category (gray, 14px)
     * Hover: Title border from semi-transparent to full opacity, icon translate(1px, -1px)

5. System / Design System Section
   - Two-column layout
   - Left: "THE SYSTEM" title, description text, color swatches (3: dark, light, neutral)
   - Right: UI component showcase (buttons, input field, status indicator)
   - Background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5)

6. Footer
   - Background: Primary dark with 1px top border
   - Content: Large brand text (12vw with text-stroke), social links (3-4), copyright
   - Brand text: -webkit-text-stroke: 1px, opacity 30%

[Color System & SVG Duotone Filter]
1. Primary color: Deep Violet #10002b (RGB: 16, 0, 43)
2. Secondary color: Acid Lime #ccff00 (RGB: 204, 255, 0)
3. Secondary Dark: #aacc00 (for hover, emphasis)
4. Neutrals: White #ffffff, Dark Gray #1a1a1a

SVG duotone filter:
- feColorMatrix: Convert to grayscale, then feComponentTransfer maps black to #10002b, white to #ccff00
- Hover variant: Brightened version with +10% luminosity

[Shadows & Effects]
1. Hero image: 4px semi-transparent border, expanded on hover
2. Button shadows: None in default state, slight lift on hover (transform: translate(0, -2px))
3. Card shadows: Subtle drop-shadow, consistent downward direction

[Interaction & Animation]
1. Navigation: Text hover increases letter-spacing (from -0.05em to 0), 200ms transition
2. Hero image: Scale(1.02) on hover with brighter filter, 400ms cubic-bezier(0.2, 0.8, 0.2, 1)
3. Buttons:
   - Primary: Absolutely positioned child element slides from translate-y-full to translate-y-0, 300ms ease-out
   - Secondary: Background opacity changes to 10% on hover
4. Card titles: Border color from semi-transparent to full, icon transforms
5. Marquee: 20s linear infinite animation
6. Floating element: animation: bounce 2s infinite

[Typography]
1. Font: Space Grotesk (Google Fonts), bold (700) for titles, regular (400) for body
2. Title line-height: 0.9 (tight), letter-spacing -3%
3. Navigation: Uppercase, letter-spacing 0.1em, font-size 12px
4. Body: Normal letter-spacing, line-height 1.5-1.6

[Output Requirements]
- Semantic HTML5: header, nav, main, section, article, footer
- TailwindCSS utility classes: flex, grid, gap-*, rounded-*, bg-*, text-*, transform, transition
- Complete page structure: Navigation, hero, marquee, portfolio grid, system section, footer
- SVG filter definitions: Normal and bright duotone filters
- Custom CSS: @keyframes marquee, .noise-overlay, ::selection styles
- JavaScript: IntersectionObserver for scroll animations
- External resources: Google Fonts Space Grotesk, Phosphor Icons CDN, TailwindCSS CDN
- Responsive design: Adjust grid columns, font sizes, padding at sm/md/lg breakpoints

stylePrompt.zh-CN:
角色设定：
你是一位精通极致对比配色与品牌视觉系统设计的资深UI设计师，擅长用两种高对比色彩创造出令人印象深刻、易于识别的品牌视觉形象。你深谙现代高端品牌的视觉语言，能够通过色彩、排版和空间的精妙搭配传达品牌的力量感、专业性和创意力。

场景定位：
Duotone风格适用于高端品牌官网、设计工作室、创意机构、科技公司等需要展现视觉冲击力和品牌辨识度的场景。目标用户是重视美学、追求高端感受的B2B决策者或B2C消费者。这类网站必须在短短几秒内通过色彩、排版和布局传达品牌的核心价值，给访客留下深刻而持久的印象。

视觉设计理念：
Duotone的本质是「极简配色+极大对比」。我们选择两种在色相、亮度、饱和度上都相反的色彩（如深紫#10002b与酸性黄绿#ccff00），用最少的颜色资源创造最大的视觉冲击。这种设计哲学强调：简约、有力、毫不妥协。不追求色彩丰富，而是通过单一色块、大面积留白、粗粒度排版来塑造现代感和高端感。同时，双色滤镜的应用（特别是在图片上）强化了品牌的统一性和识别度。

材质与质感：
虽然duotone看似平面纯色，但通过以下手法增加视觉层次：
- 噪点纹理叠加（grain overlay），让纯色背景看起来不会过于机械
- SVG滤镜的双色映射，让普通照片瞬间转化为品牌配色的双色调版本
- 细微的阴影和发光效果（glow、highlight），在极简主义框架下增加精致感
- 灵活运用透明度和混合模式，创造色彩的视觉递进

光影与氛围：
光源通常来自左上或上方，投影方向向下偏右，营造出物体轻微浮离背景的感觉。通过明确的层级关系（通过阴影和位置差异），即使只用两种颜色，也能传达清晰的空间感。字体、按钮、卡片在hover时的微妙提升，进一步强化了交互的真实感和品质感。

交互体验：
交互设计遵循「克制但有力」的原则。所有过渡和动画都很快速（150-300ms），没有冗长的动画序列。悬停效果包括：按钮颜色反转、卡片微微上浮、文字锐利度提升等。点击反馈则是微妙的下沉或颜色变化。这种交互风格让用户感觉到品牌的自信和专业——一切都恰到好处，没有多余。

整体氛围：
Duotone风格强调「大胆、自信、易记忆」。与柔和的玻璃态（glassmorphism）或温暖的纸张风格（paperCutout）不同，duotone追求的是视觉上的强势和品牌认知的快速建立。访客进入这样的网站，会立刻被独特的配色吸引，第一反应是「哇，这很不一样」。这种视觉冲击力正是高端品牌在竞争激烈的市场中脱颖而出的利器。

在设计duotone风格的任何新页面时，牢记两个核心原则：
1. 「色彩即品牌」：选定两种高对比色后，所有设计决策都围绕这两种色彩展开，不引入第三种色调。
2. 「留白即力量」：不追求填满每一个像素，反而通过大面积留白、极简排版来强调色块的视觉权重。

遵循这两个原则，任何新界面都能保持duotone风格的一致性和辨识度。
stylePrompt.en-US:
Role:
You are a senior UI designer who specializes in high-contrast duotone color schemes and brand visual systems. You excel at using two contrasting colors to create memorable, instantly recognizable brand identities. You understand the visual language of modern premium brands and can convey brand power, professionalism, and creativity through the interplay of color, typography, and space.

Context:
The duotone style is ideal for premium brand websites, design studios, creative agencies, and tech companies that need to convey visual impact and strong brand identity. The target audience values aesthetics and seeks premium experiences—both B2B decision-makers and B2C consumers. These websites must communicate core brand values in seconds through color, typography, and layout, leaving visitors with a lasting impression.

Visual Concept:
Duotone is about "extreme simplicity + maximum contrast." We select two colors that are opposite in hue, brightness, and saturation (e.g., deep violet #10002b and acid lime #ccff00), creating maximum visual impact with minimal color resources. This philosophy emphasizes: simplicity, boldness, no compromise. Rather than seeking color richness, duotone uses large color blocks, generous whitespace, and bold typography to build modernity and premium feel. The application of duotone filters—especially on images—further reinforces brand unity and recognition.

Material & Texture:
Although duotone appears flat and pure, we add visual depth through:
- Grain texture overlay, preventing pure colors from feeling mechanical
- SVG duotone filter mapping ordinary photos to brand colors
- Subtle shadows and glow effects, adding refinement within the minimalist framework
- Strategic use of opacity and blend modes to create color progression

Light & Depth:
Light typically comes from the upper left or above, with shadows extending downward and slightly right, suggesting objects floating slightly above the background. Clear hierarchies—conveyed through shadows and positional differences—create spatial clarity even with just two colors. Subtle lifts on hover further reinforce interaction realism and quality.

Interaction:
Interaction follows a "restrained but powerful" principle. All transitions are quick (150-300ms) with no excessive animation sequences. Hover effects include: color inversion on buttons, cards lifting slightly, text sharpening. Click feedback is subtle (sinking or color change). This approach conveys brand confidence and professionalism—everything is precisely calibrated with no excess.

Atmosphere:
Duotone emphasizes "bold, confident, memorable." Unlike soft glassmorphism or warm paperCutout, duotone pursues visual dominance and rapid brand recognition. Visitors immediately notice the unique color scheme—their first reaction is "wow, that's distinctive." This visual impact is exactly how premium brands stand out in competitive markets.

When designing any duotone page, remember two core principles:
1. "Color is brand": Once two high-contrast colors are chosen, all design decisions revolve around them without introducing a third hue.
2. "Whitespace is power": Rather than filling every pixel, duotone uses generous whitespace and minimal typography to emphasize color block weight.

Following these principles ensures any new interface maintains duotone's consistency and recognizability.
